name: Lucidity
body:
### Java object mapping made easy
Lucidity is an object mapper for Java and the [Cassandra](http://cassandra.apache.org) database. 

### Features
 * Uses [CQL](http://cassandra.apache.org/doc/cql3/CQL.html) and the native protocol
 * Annotation-based

### Getting Started

```
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.opennms</groupId>
  <artifactId>lucidity</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
